justification: The article states, “we introduce the concept of telotopic negentropy—a measure of emotional convergence toward a situational objective,” and later labels it “Telotopic Negentropy as a Quantifier of Affective Hierarchy,” indicating this metric is proposed to operationalize affective coherence.

In the methods proposal it says, “Participants would be exposed to simulated hierarchical interactions… with continuous measurement of affective responses through facial expression analysis, voice modulation, and galvanic skin response,” explicitly linking these instruments to the measurement of affective states.
